sources.title: Jaguar
sources.description:
The events of the film take place in a fictitious country, the main character is a cadet at a privileged military school, who accidentally ended up there from the very bottom of society. Now he is a Jaguar, he is a fighter against the totalitarian regime.

Year of production: 1986

Director: Alarc√≥n Sebastian
Screenwriters: Alarcon Sebastian, Yakovleva Tatyana
Composers: Babushkin Victor, Alarcon Sebastian
Director of photography: Ivanov Anatoly
Production designer: Shreter Irina

Cast: Vsevolod Shilovsky, Sergei Veksler, Sergei Gazarov, Artem Kaminsky, Adel Al-Hadad, Yanina Khachaturova, Vladimir Tatosov, Islam Kaziev, Sergei Shkalikov, Grigory Lampe, Nina Ter-Osipyan, Arsen Amaspyuryants, Bakhrom Akramov, Igor Vernik, Arslan Kazibeev, Oleg Laziev, Mikhail Lakshin, Nikita Romanov

metadata.Plot: Krishna, a young medical student, strikes against corrupt figures of power as a vigilante and tries to decribes his father's injustice death while trying to win the love of his friend's sister as a college student.
metadata.Writer: Gururaj M. Desai, Vishwa Karun, A. Mahadev
metadata.Actors: Nikhil Gowda, Deepti Sati, Jagapathi Babu
